00018         // double precision constants

00020         const double DP1sc = 7.85398125648498535156E-1;
00021         const double DP2sc = 3.77489470793079817668E-8;
00022         const double DP3sc = 2.69515142907905952645E-15;
00023 
00024         const double C1sin = 1.58962301576546568060E-10;
00025         const double C2sin = -2.50507477628578072866E-8;
00026         const double C3sin = 2.75573136213857245213E-6;
00027         const double C4sin = -1.98412698295895385996E-4;
00028         const double C5sin = 8.33333333332211858878E-3;
00029         const double C6sin = -1.66666666666666307295E-1;
00030 
00031         const double C1cos = -1.13585365213876817300E-11;
00032         const double C2cos = 2.08757008419747316778E-9;
00033         const double C3cos = -2.75573141792967388112E-7;
00034         const double C4cos = 2.48015872888517045348E-5;
00035         const double C5cos = -1.38888888888730564116E-3;
00036         const double C6cos = 4.16666666666665929218E-2;
00037 
00038         const double DP1 = 7.853981554508209228515625E-1;
00039         const double DP2 = 7.94662735614792836714E-9;
00040         const double DP3 = 3.06161699786838294307E-17;

00042         // single precision constants
00043 
00044         const float DP1F = 0.78515625;
00045         const float DP2F = 2.4187564849853515625e-4;
00046         const float DP3F = 3.77489497744594108e-8;
00047 
00048         const float T24M1 = 16777215.;

00052         inline double get_sin_px(const double x) {
00053             double px = C1sin;
00054             px *= x;
00055             px += C2sin;
00056             px *= x;
00057             px += C3sin;
00058             px *= x;
00059             px += C4sin;
00060             px *= x;
00061             px += C5sin;
00062             px *= x;
00063             px += C6sin;
00064             return px;
00065         }
00066 
00067         //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 
00069         inline double get_cos_px(const double x) {
00070             double px = C1cos;
00071             px *= x;
00072             px += C2cos;
00073             px *= x;
00074             px += C3cos;
00075             px *= x;
00076             px += C4cos;
00077             px *= x;
00078             px += C5cos;
00079             px *= x;
00080             px += C6cos;
00081             return px;
00082         }
00083 
00084         //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086         inline double reduce2quadrant(double x, int32_t& quad) {
00087 
00088             x = fabs(x);
00089             quad = int(ONEOPIO4 * x); // always positive, so (int) == std::floor
00090             quad = (quad + 1) & (~1);
00091             const double y = double(quad);
00092             // Extended precision modular arithmetic
00093             return ((x - y * DP1) - y * DP2) - y * DP3;
00094         }
00095 
00096         //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098         inline void fast_sincos_m45_45(const double z, double& s, double& c) {
00099 
00100             double zz = z * z;
00101             s = z + z * zz * get_sin_px(zz);
00102             c = 1.0 - zz * .5 + zz * zz * get_cos_px(zz);
00103         }
00104 
00105         //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 
00107     } // End namespace details
00108 
00110     inline void fast_sincos(const double xx, double& s, double& c) {
00111         // I have to use doubles to make it vectorise...
00112 
00113         int j;
00114         double x = details::reduce2quadrant(xx, j);
00115         const double signS = (j & 4);
00116 
00117         j -= 2;
00118 
00119         const double signC = (j & 4);
00120         const double poly = j & 2;
00121 
00122         details::fast_sincos_m45_45(x, s, c);
00123 
00124         // swap
00125         if (poly == 0) {
00126             const double tmp = c;
00127             c = s;
00128             s = tmp;
00129         }
00130 
00131         if (signC == 0.)
00132             c = -c;
00133         if (signS != 0.)
00134             s = -s;
00135         if (xx < 0.)
00136             s = -s;
00137     }

00139     // Single precision functions

00141     namespace details {
00142         //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144         inline float reduce2quadrant(float x, int& quad) {
00145             /* make argument positive */
00146             x = fabs(x);
00147 
00148             quad = int(ONEOPIO4F * x); /* integer part of x/PIO4 */
00149 
00150             quad = (quad + 1) & (~1);
00151             const float y = float(quad);
00152             // quad &=4;
00153             // Extended precision modular arithmetic
00154             return ((x - y * DP1F) - y * DP2F) - y * DP3F;
00155         }
00156 
00157         //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00158 
00160         inline void fast_sincosf_m45_45(const float x, float& s, float& c) {
00161 
00162             float z = x * x;
00163 
00164             s = (((-1.9515295891E-4f * z + 8.3321608736E-3f) * z -
00165                   1.6666654611E-1f) *
00166                  z * x) +
00167                 x;
00168 
00169             c = ((2.443315711809948E-005f * z - 1.388731625493765E-003f) * z +
00170                  4.166664568298827E-002f) *
00171                     z * z -
00172                 0.5f * z + 1.0f;
00173         }
00174 
00175         //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 
00177     } // end details namespace
00178 
00180     inline void fast_sincosf(const float xx, float& s, float& c) {
00181 
00182         int j;
00183         const float x = details::reduce2quadrant(xx, j);
00184         int signS = (j & 4);
00185 
00186         j -= 2;
00187 
00188         const int signC = (j & 4);
00189         const int poly = j & 2;
00190 
00191         float ls, lc;
00192         details::fast_sincosf_m45_45(x, ls, lc);
00193 
00194         // swap
00195         if (poly == 0) {
00196             const float tmp = lc;
00197             lc = ls;
00198             ls = tmp;
00199         }
00200 
00201         if (signC == 0)
00202             lc = -lc;
00203         if (signS != 0)
00204             ls = -ls;
00205         if (xx < 0)
00206             ls = -ls;
00207         c = lc;
00208         s = ls;
00209     }
